about.title: About Mazunte Today
about.description: A free, community-powered events board for Mazunte and the Oaxacan coast.
about.howStep1: Anyone can submit an event through our form — it takes 2 minutes.
about.howStep2: We review and approve events within a few hours.
about.howStep3: Your event appears on the homepage, category pages, and search.
about.faq1q: Is it free to list an event?
about.faq1a: Yes, completely free. We want every event in Mazunte to be discoverable.
about.faq2q: How fast do events get approved?
about.faq2a: Usually within a few hours. We review submissions daily.
about.faq3a: Yes! When submitting, toggle "recurring" and select the days of the week. We'll generate all the dates automatically.
about.faq4q: I run a venue. Can you list all my events?
about.faq4a: Absolutely. Send us your weekly schedule via WhatsApp and we'll add everything for you.
about.faq5q: How do I edit or remove my event?
about.faq5a: Send us a message on WhatsApp and we'll update or remove it right away.
about.contactDescription: Questions, ideas, or just want to say hi? Reach out on WhatsApp.
